page.title: 10LEISURE SURVEY
page.content: 6. The Infant children favour indoor games and art and craft activities but the Secondary children show no interest in these pursuits. Very few of all the children use their leisure time enjoying music but many spend time looking after pets. 7. Gardening is a very popular activity for both men and women. It is at least a weekly occupation for over 65% of them. It is interesting to note that 91% of the women cook daily while only 3.7% of men can claim the same. Over half the men spend a great deal of time maintaining the house and car. Music and visits to the theatre or cinema are only rare activities.
